LanguageData.ARA_CreepyCrawly.degreeDatas.0.label: Arthropod
LanguageData.ARA_CreepyCrawly.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef}'s enormous arthropod body, with its numerous limbs, reflective exoskeleton, and undulating, segmented physique, is enough to invoke a deep-seated fear in the human mind.\n\nWell, you didn't really think of them as beautiful girls, did you?
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Main_Trait.degreeDatas.0.label: I Am The Swarm
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Main_Trait.degreeDatas.0.descr: {PAWN_nameDef} is the only individual within the Arachne colony capable of producing the Drone, and as the pinnacle of the hive mind, she bears the great mission of leading the Arachne Swarm.\n\nShe controls the majority of the swarm's autonomous consciousness, and the Drones under her dominion no longer feel sadness or fear, becoming a powerful army of flesh and blood—however, when she suffers a mental break, that state of collapse propagates through the hive network to all her offspring!
